events.title: Annual Charity Run
events.introduction: Join us for the annual charity run to raise funds for local shelters and rescue organizations. Runners of all levels are welcome to participate!

events.title: Volunteer Day at the Animal Shelter
events.introduction: We're looking for volunteers to help out at the local animal shelter. Spend a day playing with cute animals and make a difference in their lives!

events.title: Movie Night Under the Stars
events.introduction: Grab your blankets and join us for a movie night under the stars! We'll be showing a family-friendly movie and providing popcorn and snacks.
